sub_title: Digital transformation & strategy leader | Healthcare | Interim, Consulting | Strategy design & strategy delivery | Ph.D (digital) health strategy | value based health care | Section Chair AI in cardiology working group
summary:
Medtech enthusiast pur sang. Utilising my proven trackrecord to help companies grow or restructure as a consultant. Experience consulting for startups, scale-ups, and blue chip multinationals, including those within dental, cardiology, orthopedics and AI.

Strategy design and implementation; development and implementation of digital platforms; M&A due diligence; etc. Able to take a helicopter view of strategy, finance and operations, I add value across all business units. Keen interest in seeding, development, research and launch of digital health technologies.

Keywords: Consultancy, Interim, value based healthcare, digital health, preventative, AI, cardiovascular, dental, orthopedic, PROMS, WEF, sales, digital marketing, M&A, reimbursement, PhD, research.

—

I am passionate to help improve our world for our people. Richard has been and is active for several blue chips in seeding, development, research and launch for digital health technologies in the global medtech space.

Richard’s focus is in medical AI and its integration in our global healthcare eco system, leveraging PhD research, VBHC (value based health care) and Strategy for conscious equitable implementation.

Hence, he initiates, drives, leads and delivers.  Meaningful versatile top-level strategy design and strategy delivery by understanding and connecting different points of view and enabling digital health.

—

His dedication is fueled through late discovery of cardiovascular incidence in my proximity. (parent)

Moving forward - He believes that medical AI, AI ECG can help underdiagnosed patients and bring care to underserved populations.

He is convinced that the combination of value-based care, PROMS, activity based- costing and AI can help bring superior care to those who need it.

profile_positions.description:
L.S:  next-to: PhD digital health strategy & Global Health Advisory, NGO’s. Please kindly view my Linkedin volunteering section. 

- Leading Strategy and Innovation: strategic and technical product plan / R&D / business model, product integration, DevOps Agile, roadmap design (program management), alignment of time vs value of upstream development and consecutive downstream integration 
- Metrics: finance analysis and kpi growth monitoring. 
- Create new (software/AI) business cases on business sensibility and needs
- Ownership & build bridges: Develop with team; innovative reimbursement and realization (scale up, innovation launches) for key markets. 
- Support & partner with teams: segmentation and Value Proposition creation, including the creation of integrated market automation, (software & hardware) use cases, tools and ROI on investments (business modeling)
- Digital twin / medical imaging / cloud native / platform based / patient specific / AI, ML / Software / iPaaS, SaaS
- Software as Service, integrated technologies, including robotics, imaging & (decentralized) services, digital workflow solutions and associated open api platform.
- Lead (strategic) project team for programs managed – revenue undisclosed. (+0.6 Bio)
- Tasks: Product Lifecycle management, product champion, market access, market research, regulatory, business-development, roadmap, materials, culturally specific, C-suite presentations,
- Accountability: programs; monthly follow-up / forecasting + performance review of subsidiary and distributors - Identify CSF, needs, give top level support to my teams and line managers
- Leader / leading and enable the local team (+ extended teams through matrix org, R&D & compliance)

Key: patient specific / AI, ML / iPaaS, API, (middleware) / software / open platform creation / cloud based / digital transformation / business model innovation
